Happy Couple

made for each other

Ms. Ujala

The Bride

She is crazy but cute, moody but funny.. a beautiful and dearest princess to her family.. and a wonderful friend to her buddies but to top it all she is the kindest and adorable girl anyone would love to be with!

Mr. Ravi

The Groom

He is a handsome hunk with attractive brown eyes.. Much mature by mind but child at heart. Calm and caring towards his loved ones.. adventurous and passionate for his work. No girl can ask more enough than this man with heart of gold!

We are going to enjoy the Sweet Moment

Our Sweet Love Story

our favorite love story

First Meet

25 Nov 2017

When ‘He’ met ‘Her’ ♥ Meeting you was like listening to a song for the first time and knowing it would be my favorite. I still remember the way you looked at me in the eyes and we just clicked at that very moment.. the way you smiled at me and every little thing fell into its place.

First Date

1 Dec 2017

I can never ever forget that special first date of ours in Eulogia. It’s like, in that moment the whole universe existed just to bring us together. If I could have ask God one thing, it would be to stop the moon. Stop the moon and make that night and your presence last forever.

Proposal

15 Jan 2018

When she asked, ‘’I love you so much. You are the smile of my lips and warmth to my heart. We will laugh together, we will smile together, we will cry together, we will share our sadness and happiness. There is no place beautiful for me in this world, but when you are with me. I will forget every problem when I lean my head on your shoulder because you are the man of my dreams. I always want to be with you. Will you be mine forever?” He smiled with a heart full of love and said, “YES”..! :)
